title: The Dead Gambler
description: Jake is a gambler down on his luck and just evicted from his flat. Sitting on a bench he finds a mobile phone that belongs to a local missing teenage girl. On it is a photograph of a known gangster that Jake has had dealings with in the past and knows that he is extremely dangerous. From this seemingly innocuous beginning Jake is then drawn into a dark supernatural battle against pure evil. http://www.amazon.co.uk/The-Dead-Gamb...
author: Gerald Neal
